title: Chesapeake & Ohio Canal National Historical Park: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Our classroom materials include activities and lesson plans about the canal using historic photographs, reading material, and videos. All Curriculum Materials       Classroom Materials Learn More     Field Trips Come and visit us in Maryland at Cumberland, Williamsport, and Great Falls.  All Field Trips       Come Visit the Park Learn More     Guest Speakers Rangers are available to come to your classroom.  All Guest Speakers       We Come to Your Class Learn More
